title: MARKS: IIT JEE & NEET Prep App
description: MARKS is a free app in which you can download and practice chapter-wise previous year questions of IIT JEE Main, IIT JEE Advanced, NEET, BITSAT, WBJEE, MHT CET, NDA, KVPY and much more.

title: Qupiq - Compare & Delete Dupli
description: Qupiq - The best app to easily manage duplicate and similar photos in gallery. Automatically groups similar pics and helps quickly compare them to keep the best and delete the rest

title: Play it (Spotify-clone-Android)
description: This app, inspired by Spotify, enables offline song playback through Media Player components, Background Services, and Custom notifications.
